ingredients.item: 210g heston from Waitrose earl Grey and Lemon Gin

instructions.step: Put the gin, lemon wedges and Angostura bitters in a cocktail shaker and fill to the top with ice cubes. Put the lid on the shaker and, holding the top, shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Pour into 6 chilled tumblers.
Carefully pour 20g port over the surface of each drink before serving.
